trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Red Lion
There were no other sightings in Red Lion on or around June 24th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI waled out front off my house with one off my sons friends to smoke,No sooner than we got out there I looked up in the sky and there it was coming across the sky on a level flight path.At first I thought it was a plane so I said to him look at the UFO joking and he looked.He had his camera phone and tried to get a picture but it would not pick it up but it could pick up the stars.We continued to watch it as it went across the sky to see if you could see any blinking lights as it went by but it did not.Also there was a plane coming towards it at the same time.As we continued to watch this it kept the same brightness the whole time,it did not have any kind off tail to it so I am pretty sure it was no comet or meteor and it was only flying maybe about 100 feet above telephone poles.The planes were higher than this thing and moving a whole lot faster then the planes were.We watched this thing until we could no longer see it.I watch stuff on UFO`s all the time and I never thought that I would ever see one I always hoped that I would but you just never know.The papers were calling it a fireball what I saw was no fireball it had no tail.
Summary: Had level flying and other planes in area.
